title: The Lost Heir
author: Tui Sutherland
review: Highly recommend this book to any who love to get lost in a book that build an alternate universe!

title: The Endless Lake
author: Erin Hunter
review: This book is an easy read. It is a little too straight forward to be overly exciting but I would still recommend it.

title: Isaac's Storm
author: Erik Larson
review: This book is way more dense and technical than I was expecting.
